ca.keefer.sanemethod.Environment
Class EntityLayer

java.lang.Object
  ca.keefer.sanemethod.Environment.EntityLayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Layer
public class EntityLayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Layer

The EntityLayer class implements the Layer interface, and provides a common layer for entities on the same level to be drawn together. This layer is attached to a specific ViewPort, to which a reference is maintained.

Author:
Christopher Keefer
